The world lives for pleasure, for selfishness, and how can we hope to draw the world to Christ, when we also live for the gratification of self? Christ has said, "Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature."--MS. 53, 1895.

Chap. 26 - Appeal to Young Men
[WRITTEN FROM GISBORNE,
NEW ZEALAND, OCTOBER 28, 1893.]

By Ellen G. White
     My mind is exercised in regard to the young men who have crossed the broad waters to America, in order to obtain an education that they thought they could not obtain in their own country.
